title: TVLine Items: Gangs of London Teaser, Severance Podcast and More
description: AMC’s Gangs of London are back in action: UK broadcaster Sky has released a teaser trailer for Season 3 of the high-octane crime drama, which airs on AMC here in the United States. “As chaos erupts in London after a spiked shipment of cocaine kills hundreds, fan-favorite characters collide with new faces bound by blood […]
author: Dave Nemetz
excerpt: AMC's 'Gangs of London' are back in action — get a sneak peek at Season 3 with a new trailer.
text: TVLine Items: Gangs of London Teaser, Severance Podcast and MoreAMC’s Gangs of London are back in action: UK broadcaster Sky has released a teaser trailer for Season 3 of the high-octane crime drama, which airs on AMC here in the United States. “As chaos erupts in London after a spiked shipment of cocaine kills hundreds, fan-favorite characters collide with new faces bound by blood ties, sparking brutal power struggles, unexpected alliances, and fierce rivalries,” per the official Season 3 synopsis. (Press PLAY above for a sneak peek.) Sope Dirisu stars as former undercover cop-turned-gangster Elliot, with a supporting cast that includes Joe Cole (Peaky Blinders), Colm Meaney (Star Trek: The Next Generation) and Michelle Fairley (Game of Thrones). Season 3 is expected to debut on AMC sometime next year, but a premiere date has not yet been set. Ready for more of today’s newsy nuggets? Well… * Apple TV+’s Severance is launching an official companion podcast hosted by star Adam Scott and director/executive producer Ben Stiller, our sister site Variety reports. The podcast will debut on Tuesday, Jan. 7 with a look back at Season 1, leading up to the Season 2 premiere on Friday, Jan. 17. * Pamela Adlon (Better Things) will guest-star as Mindy, the sister of Nathan Lane’s Bunny, on the upcoming Hulu comedy Mid-Century Modern, EP Max Mutchnick revealed on Instagram. Which of today’s TVLine Items piques your interest?
html:
TVLine Items: Gangs of London Teaser, Severance Podcast and More

AMC’s Gangs of London are back in action: UK broadcaster Sky has released a teaser trailer for Season 3 of the high-octane crime drama, which airs on AMC here in the United States.

“As chaos erupts in London after a spiked shipment of cocaine kills hundreds, fan-favorite characters collide with new faces bound by blood ties, sparking brutal power struggles, unexpected alliances, and fierce rivalries,” per the official Season 3 synopsis. (Press PLAY above for a sneak peek.)

Sope Dirisu stars as former undercover cop-turned-gangster Elliot, with a supporting cast that includes Joe Cole (Peaky Blinders), Colm Meaney (Star Trek: The Next Generation) and Michelle Fairley (Game of Thrones). Season 3 is expected to debut on AMC sometime next year, but a premiere date has not yet been set.

Ready for more of today’s newsy nuggets? Well…

* Apple TV+’s Severance is launching an official companion podcast hosted by star Adam Scott and director/executive producer Ben Stiller, our sister site Variety reports. The podcast will debut on Tuesday, Jan. 7 with a look back at Season 1, leading up to the Season 2 premiere on Friday, Jan. 17.

* Pamela Adlon (Better Things) will guest-star as Mindy, the sister of Nathan Lane’s Bunny, on the upcoming Hulu comedy Mid-Century Modern, EP Max Mutchnick revealed on Instagram.

Which of today’s TVLine Items piques your interest?
